publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World

description.value: You refuse to let anyone control you. Whenever you attempt a Will save against a spell or effect that would give you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr] condition, roll twice and use the higher result. If you would start your turn confused or controlled, you can immediately attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5]. On a success, you fight that mental control, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} until the end of your turn rather than acting against your will. If you roll a 20 on this check, you immediately end the confused or controlled condition.
